name: My projects
body:
### Next Episodes
Next Episodes is a site where you can enter a tv show, and it'll give you a countdown until the next episode airs! On the MyShows page you can enter multiple tv shows, and you can see all of their countdowns in one glance!

See the official version of this project in action [here] (http://van-der-noord.nl/whensmyshow).

See the latest test-version in action [here] (http://robinvandernoord.github.io/nextepisodes/)

See releases at http://github.com/robinvandernoord/nextepisodes/releases

[Latest mac release] (https://github.com/robinvandernoord/nextepisodes/releases/tag/MyShowsOSX1.2) :apple:

[Latest pc release] (https://github.com/robinvandernoord/nextepisodes/releases/tag/MyShowsWIN1.2) :computer:



### Bubbles
A cute little moving bubbly 'font', with secret keywords to do extra things!

[See it in action](http://van-der-noord.nl/bubbles/)

[read the blog](http://van-der-noord.nl/bubbles/blog.html)

### the `American Horror Story Name Game`

An [American Horror Story Name Game Generator](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MFf4TYGpFj0)!

See it in action [here](http://van-der-noord.nl/namegame)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
